TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Myawan, title = Myawan, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Myawan} }

S.FORM: Myawan Itiniay i Xiulin Cen no Hualien ko Myawan a niyaro', 44 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 166 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 162 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Truku 82%, Amis 5%, Tayal 2%, Paiwan 1%, Bunun 2%, roma 5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Myawan Itiniay i Xiolin Cen no Hoalien ko Myawan a niyaro', 44 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 166 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 98% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin , polong han i, 162 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 2% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 4 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Troko 82%, Amis 5%, Tayal 2%, Paiwan 1%, Bonon 2%, roma 5%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
